lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I will be sure to take this "information to the Archivists."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Also, we're having a big Con soon, so if you feel like joining, it's super fun.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: There will be food and costumes and--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: She kind of has a point towards the cult thing, just throwing that out.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Both, but in this instance, "strange new forms of worship and "gatherings of worshipers "can sometimes lead in a negative direction."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So it's not like it's anything new.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I like new things, new things are nice.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yes, should we find Essek and try to follow up on those loose ends we've mentioned?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Although I personally would wish to soon, but I feel like we should touch base and I don't want to spook any of the people--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "It is all right, if you require me, I will be upstairs," and they turn around and head upstairs.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I thought we were talking about-- mmkay.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's all right, we need some private time anyway.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Hard to believe the two of you were friends.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's always so awkward to have a personal relationship with the help, you know? It makes things very awkward.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is it? I don't know, we always were very friendly with the people helping around our place.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Well, we've-- okay hang on, DM question.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We more or less got confirmation that the demon holes that were splintering in from the Abyss were only happening on the Xhorhas side, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Actually no, you heard word that apparently similar activity seems to have been occurring--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I knew we got confirmation one way or the other.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: From Yussa while you guys were in Nicodranas.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Our two week break is our attempt to be more like a real D&D game and like--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I know it's been two weeks, it's okay.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That weekly game is so easy to pick up.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Word from Nicodranas that it was happening on both sides.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The last you saw of the Laughing Hand, Obann and Yasha was when you escaped--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That was the last you saw of them.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He said he was going to prepare for us or something.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do we know where he lives? Have we been to his house?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I don't think we've been to his--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We should go see the Bright Queen.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I get the sense the last time we saw her that we shouldn't be hitting that button willy-nilly, you know?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You have an appointment with someone you need to see.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Maybe take a night, meditate, think about what the next move is.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Let's-- if we can just summon Essek.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to try to summon him.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to send him another message.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, what message do you send?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We don't want to summon you or anything.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do we still have cupcakes? Bribe him with cupcakes.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's too late. I already ate them all.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He responds a moment later with "Ah, so you have "returned. Then I will gather myself "and head to your abode posthaste."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Well, it is good to see that you have survived "your encounter, it would seem, with the dragon's den, "of which I last sent you."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: A bit of a close shave, but we made it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "So, "what is it you've summoned me for?"

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We feel it has been awhile since we have checked in with the Queen and yourself and we mean to be of use, if we may and I hope--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I just want you to know that, but okay, keep going.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Our track record has been a little less stellar than I would have liked, but I would hope that this encounter with a White Dragon would--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Well, we also haven't heard about any reports from, you know, our last incident.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We were curious if there had been any word of any sight of the Laughing Hand or this creature?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "None have come back, but we are indeed looking, "so do not worry."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: To be clear, did you send anyone to the location that we mentioned? I mean, certainly there must have been some sort of remnant or sign that they were there.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "But we are looking, do not worry."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I think we are also possibly curious about-- the Queen mentioned beacons still within the Empire and if we can, perhaps, steal the breath from a dragon, it stands to reason that we could help with those as well.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Good, so you are now in "a place to call in some of the debt."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I would request on the behalf of the Bright Queen "to see if you can discover "where this beacon is being held."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "If you can bring us this information, "you may be aiding in bringing "an end to this conflict sooner than later."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Have you any ideas of individuals?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Well, I could name off the Assembly for you, "if you'd like. But I get the sense you already know them."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can I get the sense he's being genuine when he talks about ending the conflict?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You need to fucking warm it up.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No. I'm supposed to be good at this shit.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh can, oh wait, can I give you Guidance? Is it too late?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's too late. You've got to do it before the roll, sorry.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Everybody take longer to pick up your dice.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I think we both can do Guidance.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So it's kind of hard to read.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We do have ties in the Empire.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: In all these rumors that you are parsing out, is there any area of the Empire in particular you have heard of this thing being seen last?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Should you learn this information, "for this reason, you need to let us know soon."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Do you happen to have any other teams on this sort of quest?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Oh, we have a few spies throughout, yes."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Any way that we would be able to identify them just in case we happen to cross each other's paths?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What about that prisoner that they're keeping, Caleb? Would that be a place to start?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "You have a couple more days "before the execution is carried out, so "I would recommend you doing what "you are looking to do soon."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: If today works, I will do it today.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'd be happy to as well.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Are you going to threaten her?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm going to talk to her.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Very well then, come with me, Widogast."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Are we all going? We're all going to go?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys are all heading with him?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, if that's all right with you, Caleb.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: As long as we don't, you know, crowd the cell itself.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Here for support, if you need it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And Guidance, whenever you need it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Chains from each arm and each leg affixed to all sides of the room and there are multiple guards at all times keeping watch.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: The chains, does she look like taut or is it loose?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They're not taut like she's being suspended.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She can't probably move more than a foot in any direction, should she wanted to.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Would you trust me enough to enter the cell with her?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I would not jeopardize our place here in the Dynasty.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Open the door." (door creaking) It's pushed open. Essek's hand glides out of the cloak and gives the universal hand motion for "you first."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You said, is she facing away from the door?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This prisoner has not been kept comfortably in the time that you've bought for her life.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (American accent) I'll confirm what you already know.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: If I recall, this is what we did last time.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm just going to come in the cell behind Caleb and like lean against the bars and keep my head down, just like behind him.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'll join as a Disguise Self, as an elf so I don't stick out.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Do you want to tell me your name?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Well, you will be dead in a few days, but I wouldn't say that it doesn't mater.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Do you have a way of getting me out, "friend of the Dynasty?"

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What would that do to you?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It doesn't haunt you at all to know that some of the deeds you've committed were predicated on lies?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I don't know how my brothers and sisters could stomach wearing that mantle of loyalty, knowing that it was woven so thoroughly from sin and I am very sorry for you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I'll die and be forgotten, "but at least I know some of my deeds "will have changed the course of history."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You've certainly learned your lessons by rote.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "He doesn't like it when people don't do as he says."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "So much potential and so little foresight."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Did you know Astrid and Eodwulf? Still alive?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I know them better than you do."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Maybe if I could talk plainly with you and see one inch of change, then I wouldn't believe we're all damned.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I hope this lesson has been very useful."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I consider you a sister, so even if you don't share the sentiment.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Well, "I've always been a little impatient." You see a whip of motion as one of the chains goes slack and the arm arcs around towards you--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You go to cast Counterspell but there's no spell.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys watch as a pray of blood begins to (spraying) out of Caleb's chest as she pulls back to go in for--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Pull out the transmuter's stone and beat her across the face with it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go ahead and make an attack roll.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We'll say two points of damage plus your strength modifier.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No wait, no that's saves, zero.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay so (smack), and what are you guys doing?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I am leaping forward, I'm going to yell: Caduceus!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Then I'm going to bash her upside the head with my shield.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, roll for an attack with the shield.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I don't know what I add to that.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is it an unarmed strike, or?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This would be considered an unarmed strike, just for flavor with the shield--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm running in to separate them and get Caleb out of there.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm trying to push her back with the shield fore.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The guards immediately rush in and raising their crossbows, fill her chest with bolts.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At which point, you watch as she begins to lift up off the ground from the chains and you see Essek, his hand out of his cloak lifting her off the ground.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I walk up to her and just stare into her eyes from six inches away.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (crunching) You watch as her entire central torso crushes inward, the chains go taut and (squeaking) you hear the metal bend as some of the chains begin to pull and break in places before she is dropped to the ground limply.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I wanted to see what he was--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You got any healing spells with that pressure, Cad?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We can't do them in here, we got to--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Move him out, here, I'll help Cad move him out.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We can't do it in here?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Out of the cell, out of the cell.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can we heal him, can we heal him? We can heal him, we can heal him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They've already loaded new bolts into the crossbow and they're all just keeping an eye on the somewhat mashed corpse.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I kind of saw that whole thing coming, not going to lie.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Did she, are you okay? Did she give you any useful information?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Do you have anything else you want to talk to her about?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I don't think she's going to hear it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I don't think she would be willing.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: She still might not want to talk.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Would you allow us to use this corpse for an interrogation?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Under our supervision, quickly "and do not mention that I allowed this to anybody." Essek looks to the guards there and he says, "And that goes for you as well." The guards all--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Taking a risk, I like it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nod and step back a bit and move away from the chamber.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I don't know if I have it ready today but we just have to keep the, we don't need much.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So what are you guys doing?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: ♪ And I know I'm a fool ♪

lines.name: TRAVIS, MATT
lines.text: ♪ Get my baby to love me tonight ♪

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: If you give me a day.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh, I'm sorry, I thought my friends were prepared.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I wasn't ready to do it immediately, but--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We could take her head with us.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You can't do it right now?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "So if there's something you cannot do now, "I'm afraid it cannot be done."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I have seem him do it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Are you attempting to speak to the corpse?"

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Which will lead them to me, which will lead them to you."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can't we just request to be in the room when they do it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I think that might be stepping beyond "the bounds of which your arrangement here is--"

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I want to help as much as I can but there are limitations."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Well, I mean, all things considered, it's a clever way of making sure you can't ask any more questions.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: She was also waiting for this opportunity.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What if she knows where the beacon is now?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "There is protocol and the last thing you need "is anything like this to be traced back to me or you."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I think we are done here.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Are there any scars on the body?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The jaw has been broken in and it's--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I was specifically curious about the arms and legs.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The arms and legs, you do notice there are scars among the forearms that are similar to the ones that Caleb has.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'd like to, if it's all right, quickly just approach the body for a second.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I want to press the arm and see what the scars feel like.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to look over Caduceus' shoulder because I know what he's doing.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What are you trying to figure out from this?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I want to know what caused the scars.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I don't know what he's doing.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You thought he was trying to milk it?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, I thought he was going to see if there's still crystals in there.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I don't think I would know that yet, but I do know they're magic scars because I've seen his.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go ahead and make a medicine check to ascertain the nature of the scars.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: While at first glance it appears to be random, you can see faint patterns in their placement in the arms, intentional.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Does it look like runes or anything like that?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Not like runes but you get the sense that at least these scars are deliberate and they're mirrored on each arm.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Did we check if that chain got broken?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Is this the same thing that happened to you?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Afraid to touch anything, I'll get yelled at.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I think we should get out of here.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: None of you speak Undercommon, correct?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Well, it seems that these "Scourgers, "these Vollstrecker are well-trained."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Best you can glance beside the crushed status of the body, from what you've seen, probably in the neighborhood of between like 5'2" and 5'6".

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I've been doing that while they were having the conversation.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You think you could make yourself look like her?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: But like a slightly better looking--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Right, she's real crazy right now.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Also out of character, did she seem younger or older than Caleb?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You'd probably guess looking at her-- it's hard to tell with how emaciated and unhealthy she is from the time she spent here after being captured but you surmise somewhere in the mid to late 20s.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What would you like to do?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I don't know, what do we do?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Are we going to check in with the Bright Queen? Do we need to like--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I don't think we need to do that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He would still be with you, unless you tell him to leave.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So is it on us? There are no resources of any kind that you could provide in our foray back to the Empire?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Information. Do you know the last place this beacon was seen?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "The last place that we know of it was in Felderwin."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You don't happen to have any safe houses or bases of operation behind enemy lines?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "For the purposes of keeping them safe, "respectfully, I cannot tell you."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The tripod, we have the tripod. Does that help us at all?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Did it touch it, does that count? Can we scry on that or anything? No, I guess not.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Are you able to scry on things you have never seen before? It would be similar obviously to the one that we possessed.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: How would it pick between the two?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Let me think about that for a minute.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: If I was clever, I would have it very protected from such things.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We've got to start somewhere, though.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I know a lot about it, I just--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I mean we could go back to Felderwin and retrace their steps, I suppose. We could--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We could try to get our hands on a living Scourger.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's a creature sort of thing. I can scry on people.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can scry on a location, but you had to have seen the location before.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I can scry on a location or a people, but not like an object, right?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well, going back to what Essek said, the members of the Assembly, do we know all the members of the Assembly?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What if we go back to--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Should we start scrying on each one?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What if we go back to Yussa Errenis in Nicodranas?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: He doesn't like the Academy, but you know how like all rich people know each other?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You know, he might've heard rumor.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I mean, we've met in person a lot of the people we're talking about.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You know, somebody that seemed to have a lot of information about lots of different things.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: If I had some incense and some ivory.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You know, I mean he had his hands in--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He might have heard about such a big artifact crossing the lines.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We have all these leads and this name Jagentoth keep coming up and they tend to be expert smugglers.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: If I was the Academy, I would try and distance myself from any of this on my hands as much as I could.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Well, they were in possession of one in Zadash.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Exactly, why couldn't they move the others?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: The military is moving in Urzin, you said?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They're sending more military towards Urzin, yes.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can you like sense dunamagic now that you have tapped into that?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's what you call it right, Essek? Sensing dunamagic?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Are you talking about... jacking into the mainframe?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "It's fine, it is difficult for many to grasp its "elaborate and esoteric depths."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm making a pun, you don't have to be patronizing.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I could meditate upon the piece if I had, I would need some incense and some ivory, but I could maybe glean some information that we didn't have.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: He is very well connected and if they're trying to move, albeit discretely through the Empire.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And everything that I am learning here I mean for the good of both our people.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: They are on me at all times.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "If you wish to watch, but I gather "this might be a bit above your "respective levels of understanding."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I have some shopping to do, personally.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, now I feel like he's just--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Now he's laying it on thick.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No, we could gather some things while they're doing this.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, we'll prep, we've got our own notes and books we have to hit.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yes I do, yes I do! As I punch your book in the fucking face, shut up.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We could go get some ivory, I guess, for you, Caducy.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: A little ivory and a little incense would go a long way.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to go fucking watch it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You earned it. You earned a show.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to go make my popcorn in the kitchen and I'm going to go sit down and watch them do it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm going to go watch people study for the SAT.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Were you referring to your den or ours?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "What is it you wish to do? "Do you wish "utility in the manipulation of the world around you?"

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Perhaps, "do you enjoy the idea of "drawing the potential from discarded timelines?"

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We'll be back here in just a minute as the wizards convene and have a lesson.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so this is the new, redesigned Hero Vaults with art by Deven Rue and Crystal Sully, friends of the show.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This specifically is, I think it's the Purpleheart, right?

lines.text: You curl up in bed and you feel something shift at the foot of the bed and you look over and you see sitting at the edge of the bed, a familiar green cloak.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "So what do you think, Kravaraad or Rumblecusp?"

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I know you said your preference may have been "with the new volcano, but you seemed "less intrigued the last time we spoke."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I mean, don't get me wrong, it was really cool, but it kind of felt like the Wildmother's territory, if that makes any sense. And, like, why would we want to go somewhere that's already been stamped upon by somebody else? Why can we go and claim something as our own, you know? Plus it's, you know, it's barren there and we haven't been to anywhere tropical in awhile.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is the other place tropical? I am assuming.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What is it like, what should we do? What are we going to do there?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "What kind of things should we prepare?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I already told everyone that I would make them Traveler cloaks so that they could all look really fancy when they're worshiping you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do you want me to make like lots of idols to you or do I need to get word out to the rest of your followers? Do they already know?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Any trinket you wish to bring along, of course."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'll make sure there's some good stuff.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's the plan, is that okay?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: They're not in any danger, right?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I just guessed like, you know, you think volcano, you think somebody's going to be sacrificed or something and that seems weird.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I miss hanging out with you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's weird that nobody else can see you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "And know that if I'm not there, I'm thinking of you."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Maybe not so much to be up in arms, but "I'm certainly curious."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Dunamancy's crazy. Did you see that guy get squished? I mean I guess she was a girl, but...

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I know, we're so close, I'm like so excited.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I'm excited for you to meet the rest of your brethren."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Sleep well." He runs the hand over the side of your head.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You turn around and nestle into your pillow and look back and he's gone.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What would you like to do?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Is there anything you'd like to do before you leave?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You want to just scry on that Vence guy one more time?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: All right, Traveler, here we go again.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I start drawing while she does this.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What was that, what does that mean? Is that a good Matt or a bad roll?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I can't tell if that's a good Matt smile or a bad Matt smile.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The Traveler sits across from you with your hands in his, facing the hood, obscuring everything but the jaw and the smile and the head cocks to one side and goes, "Not this one."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You need anything else before we go? You need some sort of like written note?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "You all have very interesting handwriting, by the way."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's a trick question. I don't have handwriting.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So will you please leave them be?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I will guarantee you they will "most likely be somewhat close to their original position."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That was Taliesin talking, not, wait, what? Okay, this changes everything, thank you, back, okay.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Dairon, can I talk to you in private for a second?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm not going to show you to a pooper, I swear.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As soon as Dairon walks with you out of the room, Dairon looks back at Jester with like a...

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Are any of these fuckers listening?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: If you fucking tell anyone I did this, I'll beat your fucking ass, okay?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Only and if you need to, I know you know how to look like some other one of us, which might buy a little bit more validity to all of it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And I pull out the symbol of the Bright Queen that I have.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And hand it over to her.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm fully in support of it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's not a fucking beer cozy.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: This is like some Dude, Where's My Car? shit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You see a smile crawl across Dairon's face.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I don't know, they might have some sort of like registry noting all people that has those and you're not one of them, so, like, don't use it, but you have it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Any other lessons you wish to impart upon me, teacher?"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I just felt like I had to be stern in that point.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I think this will definitely aid me in my endeavors."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Just tell them we like made out or something, okay? And then I leave.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you go to leave, she grabs your arm and goes "Beauregard, don't die."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You tell me that every time, and I haven't forgotten.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "So far, so good, so I'll keep telling you that," and releases you.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right, ready for the trip?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Shagging your way through this game.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The familiar scents of being pulled through this strange arcane tether, through a dark space and then you all gather your feet under the stone floor within Yussa's tower in Nicodranas.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh, we didn't message him in advance again.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Real soon we're going to pop in, okay? We're just letting you know in advance before we get there.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: This message might take a while.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: This message could take a while to get to you because we're--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I hate it when the service doesn't send the message.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh man, it was just like caught in a--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: But it says four bars! Why?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Kind of putting the glasses up.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Right when he comes to the door, I jump and land like we had just got there.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, we just got here. Crazy timing.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Do you require "a meeting with the master or are you just passing through?"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He told us that he was here, though, on the premises though, is that right?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He said he's busy though, he's busy.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I mean do we want to ask about the beacon?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We could go check in while we're here.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: At some point, we could check in.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He says he's busy, it could take a while.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You did very much just jump right in the middle of his day.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: A day while we figure things out, yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It is still night in Nicodranas.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Are we still possibly in trouble here? I don't remember.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's like 4:00 in the morning or 5:00 in the morning.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You gather the time right now in Nicodranas, and I'm ballparking here based on early morning leaving there, it's probably somewhere in the neighborhood of, I'd say, 1:00 or 2:00 in the morning.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Almost the middle of the night, but not quite.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So I'd say you're about to hit dawn.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well, what do we do now?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What are we going to do before the sun is up?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Check in with mom, get the, start getting the shit together.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Family, family, Orly, Yussa, arrange for travel.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh man, do we have any gem dust yet?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you would probably be able to crush gems pretty well.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We have 2500 gold worth of gems.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: The gems are better served for other--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I was saving up my money, but I just--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Where can we go to get horses and carts and things?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There are liveries and all kinds of other places to pick up beasts of burden, to pick up riding horses, to pick up anything in that regard and you've made the journey to and from Nicodranas and from the Empire many times, so you can, you know the faster routes and the elements there.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Let's go check in with mom.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, she's awake. She's for sure awake right now.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: As we're walking to the Lavish Chateau, I keep an eye out for any owls.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, make a perception check for me, please.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Nope, you are rolling shit tonight.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Where are you going, you heading to Lavish Chateau?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They do not usually take people in without, but you know the tricks to opening the door without a key.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Looks like he has a hand crossbow at the ready as this large minotaur form pokes down.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah, we're back.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Or a bit late depending on where you're coming from.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, that's okay, can we just get into some rooms so we can chill?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Yeah, sure, give me a minute," and he walks over and lumbers behind the main bar area off to the left side of the interior main chamber and goes through a couple of keys which are very small in his large hands and you can see him just like (grunting).

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Is he paying attention to the bar?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm going to swipe a bottle, take a few swigs, put it back.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, make a sleight of hand check.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You know you don't have to do that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I found your key, let me show you to your room."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We've done it before, it's okay.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Not going to be super long.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I'll let your mother know "when she wakes up that you've arrived."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right, so, what are we doing?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We're letting Orly know that we're going to be heading out at some point in the near future.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do we feel like we need to talk to Yussa or do we want to skip that?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I don't feel like we know enough of anything.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Should I try scrying on someone else?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to draw on the ground, I'm going to make some arcane rune-ish looking things like Caleb draws.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The smell of the sea air calms you and the Traveler once more leans in across the other shoulder this time and goes, "I think we've found someone this time."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Did I recognize the city, did it look familiar?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: In the quick glance that you see there, the perimeter of it, at the periphery, though it is just a quick flash, there's something triangular to its shape.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can I do that, am I allowed to do that?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Not in the middle of it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All three vanish and the scrying connection is lost.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The heart buried within the Lotusden.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The skull entrusted to the elves within the Veluthil.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The Cobalt Reserve technically is in Tal'Dorei.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: The Cobalt Soul in Zadash and--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Have you visited the Archive in Zadash?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, but I've seen the outside of it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're not sure what the interior was.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes, you recognized the triangle shape of a city.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: In the city or the city--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The city had a triangular shape to its outside, like wall perimeter.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That sounds a lot like the Cobalt.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: If they were at the Soul, they were looking for information, we have restricted books that hide secrets and information that should be kept from people just like Obann.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Have we heard, it feels like we've heard of that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a history check, both of, anybody who's trained in history, is proficient in history, go ahead and roll.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to bless, I'm going to use a--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You can add a d4 because, if I--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I was going to use a Guidance.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, if you're doing-- Can I do it after the roll or no?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: But normally you have to do that before the roll.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This would be something you'd need to research deeper.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Is it on any of our maps?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'd say make another history check for that particular one.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to give you a pat on the back.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I think that's an old name for some place.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, no. Only one at a time, he was helping.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Once again, it doesn't quite ring a bell.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Would a religion check make sense in any of this?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, I'll allow a religion check for you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Unfortunately, your experience learning and teaching did not contain any of the information that you seek in these brief statements that Jester managed to pull from the scry.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Now we have a good excuse to take a meeting before we leave.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And you're tapped, can you scry again?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You said there was blood all over the place.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: There were dead bodies all over the place.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: See your mother, arrange travel, head into the Empire.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And that is where we'll pick up for our next session.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We had a really like defined goal for multiple chapters here and now we're just figuring out where to go next.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There's a lot of things happening at once.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Let's run away from it all and do Traveler Con.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You got time to handle some other things in the interim.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's something you have to research as well.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You have to have authority figures to rebel against or else who am I?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, it's like having hippie parents; it's so hard.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: And you just got a promotion.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's not what I meant when I said, "I hate you, mom," that's not what I meant.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I am become mom, destroyer of worlds.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Well, the fly is dead, long live the fly.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The fly is dead, long live the fly.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: He died because we were having so much fun.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There will unfortunately not be a game next week because I'll be flying to Sweden.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That'll give you guys two weeks to figure out what you want to do and where you want to go--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Are we going to do a crazy text thread like we used to?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We should do a crazy, crazy, no-Matt text thread.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's exactly what you should do.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, no one's even seen you use your crazy sword yet.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Thing has a card so long that it's practically a soliloquy.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Should we do something dumb next week?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: In the interim, we love you very much and--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Is it Thursday yet? Good night, guys.
